response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you, given its worth of $800,000 to you. My proposal is to offer this product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the return on my investment.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to provide you with all the details necessary to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
